appDesc.message: AI spell checker and paraphrasing tool for English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Hindi, and 50+ languages, powered by ChatGPT

unsupported_site_title.message: This Website Not Supported by the Extension

unsupported_site_content.message: We are working on expanding the list of supported websites for inline checking. For now, you can use our free editor and check your text in a new tab

introduce_our_free_plan.message: We are pleased to introduce our Free Plan

open_editor_btn.message: Open editor in a new tab

rate_block_title.message: Ready to give us a 5-star rating?

status_notice_text_local_limit.message: Sorry, but you've exceeded the maximum character limit for text input. Please shorten your text.

status_notice_title_unsupported_site.message: Website Not Supported by the Extension

status_notice_text_unsupported_site.message: Unfortunately, this website is not compatible with our extension.

status_notice_text_plugin_disabled.message: The plugin is currently disabled. Please enable it to continue.

status_notice_text_backend_answer.message: We're sorry, but we couldn't receive a response from the server. Please check your internet connection or try again later.

status_notice_text_unsupported_language.message: We don't support the language in which the text is entered. Please enter text in a supported language.

status_notice_title_daily_limit_reached.message: Daily Limit Exhausted on Current Plan

status_notice_text_daily_limit_reached.message: You've reached the daily limit allowed on your current plan. Consider upgrading or wait until your limit resets.

status_notice_title_monthly_limit_reache.message: Monthly Limit Exhausted on Current Plan

status_notice_text_monthly_limit_reached.message: Your usage has exceeded the monthly limit on your current plan. Please upgrade or wait for the monthly reset.

status_notice_text_overall_limit_reached.message: The extension has exceeded the overall usage limit. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later

status_notice_text_not_required_version.message: The installed plugin version is too old. Please update to the latest version for optimal performance.

status_notice_text_user_disabled.message: Sorry, but your account has been blocked. Please contact support for further assistance.

status_notice_title_min_text_limit.message: Your Text is too Short for Checking

status_notice_text_min_text_limit.message: Oops! Your text is too short for checking. Please provide a longer text.

status_notice_title_max_text_limit.message: Your Text is too Long for Checking

status_notice_text_max_text_limit.message: Sorry, but you've exceeded the maximum character limit for text input. Please shorten your text.

like_extension.message: Like the extension? Please, support us by rating on Chrome WebStore
